LEGLESS

L3GГESS | БЕЗНОГИМ is a standalone remake of Postal 2 modification with the same name. This game is based on infamous video "БЕЗНОГИМ" - fictional story about broadcast signal intrusion in Russia.

Available in the english and russian languages.

You're awake in the middle of night. You forgot to switch off your TV. Everything seems to be normal, until your TV starts to act strange. It shows a picture of bunny who's asking you not to be afraid. Are you brave enough to accept his Truth?
